Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Scott Lewis
Dear Sir,
Scott Lewis has nothing more to prove at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an ERA of 3.43 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Wilson Delgado
Dear Sir,
Wilson Delgado isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an AVG of .170, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

should demote him before he gets burned.
